alert.note: Alert for Buckingham (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 23 at 6:36PM EDT until September 23 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Virginia, including the following counties, in central Virginia, Buckingham. In south central Virginia, Charlotte and Halifax. * WHEN...Through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - 1 to 3 inches of rain with locally higher amounts possible - For safety information on the web, visit http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
